meanings.definition: Of or relating to a type or typical example.
meanings.sent1: The typal car had all the usual features you would expect.
meanings.sent2: She displayed typal behavior for a student in her grade.
meanings.sent3: The typal cat decided to take a nap in the sun.
meanings.sent4: His typal response to the situation was to remain calm and collected.
meanings.sent5: The typal house on the street was painted a bright yellow color.

meanings.definition: Conforming to a type or standard.
meanings.sent1: The typal dress code required everyone to wear black pants.
meanings.sent2: The company's typal policy was to always put the customer first.
meanings.sent3: He found himself in a typal situation where he had to make a decision.
meanings.sent4: Her typal performance on the test was exceptional.
meanings.sent5: The typal design of the building followed the latest architectural trends.
